description: An analog control used for supervisory control.

contents.name: AnalogValue
contents.description: The Control variable associated with the MeasurementValue.

contents.name: maxValue
contents.description: Normal value range maximum for any of the Control.value. Used for scaling, e.g. in bar graphs.

contents.name: minValue
contents.description: Normal value range minimum for any of the Control.value. Used for scaling, e.g. in bar graphs.
